<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/logs"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



List the available logs.

#### Permissions
The API token must include the following scopes: _Messaging_.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

  children={"Request"}

</Heading>
